author: Daniel Brettig
title: Cautious optimism within Cricket Australia on game's resumption
description: While much uncertainty remains, a report by CA's chief medical officer offers hope for the new season later this year | ESPNcricinfo.com
content:
International cricket of some kind in the next Australian summer is probable, the domestic Big Bash League and WBBL are highly likely and even the men's T20 World Cup remains a chance of happening.
These are among the views that may be drawn from a report is… [+5317 chars]
